title: Facebook Gathers Companies to Back Libra coin Launch
text: Facebook's Libra coin will serve users on the social media platform as well as across the internet.

title: Cryptos: Facebook’s cryptocurrency foray leads bitcoin to its best trading stretch in 3 weeks
text: Reports that Facebook Inc. is about to roll out a cryptocurrency as soon as next week have helped bitcoin to notch its best weekly trading period in about three weeks.

title: Facebook goes full crypto: 3 trades
text: The "Fast Money" traders give you 3 trades in Facebook as the company launches it's own cryptocurrency.

title: Facebook Watch Gaining Steam, New Features to Aid User Growth
text: Facebook (FB) Watch has now more than 720-million monthly and 140-million daily users, who spend at least one minute on Watch.

title: Facebook to introduce its own cryptocurrency
text: Surevest CEO Robert Luna on how Facebook is planning to introduce its own cryptocurrency, Libra.

title: Facebook's Libra cryptocurrency reportedly boasts big-name backers
text: It's got support from Visa, Mastercard, Uber and PayPal and could be announced as soon as next week, according to The Wall Street Journal.

title: Facebook Really Wants You to Know How Sorry It Is
text: And is willing to put its money where its mouth is.

title: SunTrust: Big Tech breakups would drive shares higher
text: Mark Mahaney of RBC Capital Markets and Youssef Squali of SunTrust join "Squawk Alley" to discuss the potential for a break up of some of the biggest names in tech.

title: Facebook is creating photorealistic homes for AIs to work and learn in
text: If AI-powered robots are ever going to help us out around the house, they're going to need a lot of experience navigating human environments. Simulators, virtual worlds that look and behave just like real life are the best place for them to learn, and Facebook has created one of the most advanced such systems yet.

title: Momentum grows to break up big tech, as Amazon, Facebook, Google and Apple face scrutiny     - CNET
text: Regulators are gearing up to investigate the largest US tech companies. But are breakups of these corporations on the horizon?

title: FB Cryptocurrency: 12 Things We Know About Facebook’s Project Libra
text:

title: How Facebook Is Breaking Into Crypto
text: Facebook Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) shares made a handy gain on Friday after over a dozen companies said that they were ready to back its upcoming foray into cryptocurrency.

title: Will Facebook Unveil Its Plans For A Cryptocurrency This Week?
text: A Facebook cryptocurrency could enable a new era of e-commerce and payments for the social network, allowing users to change dollars and other currencies into digital coins for purchases.

title: Facebook, Google and Twitter need to do more to tackle fake news, EU says
text: In a report published Friday, the EU found evidence of "coordinated inauthentic behavior" on online platforms ahead of the European Parliament elections last month.

title: Want to get paid for sharing your data with Facebook? Read this first
text: Facebook wants to pay users to fork over their data, but privacy experts say the risks could outweigh the potential financial benefits.
